subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Research
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
Good idea - I never thought of that!

I'll have to try with my Yaesu VX-6R ham radio VHF-UHF transceiver in 
scanning mode on receive and see if I get anything.

Zack

On Fri, 6 Jun 2008, Fransen, Debbie wrote:

> Frank,
>
> What do you think about using a scanner?
>
> Couldn't the spirits come through on that?
>
